issues.description: The method singFarmSongVerse in the Farm class is specified as public in the problem statement for testing purposes, but it is implemented as private in both the template and solution repositories, which could confuse students about the required visibility and prevent them from writing testable code as intended.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the visibility of the singFarmSongVerse method to public in the template and solution repositories to align with the problem statement, ensuring students can access and test it as required.

issues.description: The singFarmSongVerse method in the template repository is declared without the required parameter (Animal animal), resulting in an incomplete method signature, while the problem statement and solution repository expect it to have this parameter, potentially causing compilation errors and confusion for students trying to implement the design.
issues.suggested_fix: Correct the method signature in the template repository to include the parameter (Animal animal) to match the problem statement and solution, allowing students to implement it without structural barriers.

issues.description: The method singFarmSongVerse in the template repository is defined without the expected Animal parameter, while the problem statement explicitly describes it as taking an Animal parameter, creating confusion for students in mapping the required method signature to the starter code.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the singFarmSongVerse method in the template repository to include the Animal parameter as specified in the problem statement, ensuring the method signature aligns with the described requirements.
